page.title: 04Droitwich Industries
page.content: Droitwich has a large industrial estate called Berry Hill to the north-west of the town.21 of the 40+ factories lie in the area.All the factories are light industrial units There is a great deal of variety in what they actually do. Many of them are subsidiaries of large factories and only distribute goods from a warehouse.Kays is a typical example.There are a number of factories involved in packaging_for example Viking Packaging.Britax Vega make a large variety of parts for the interiors of cars.Two firms make the surrounds for double-glazing namely Turner-Fain and Reddiplex. Gloenco make a large variety of nylon and acrylic goods and even the materials themselves in large rolls. Many firms export their goods as far afield as Japan and U.S.A.
